func.nn.backprop

Class BackPropagationBiasNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • func.nn.Neuron
      • func.nn.feedfwd.FeedForwardNode
        • func.nn.backprop.BackPropagationNode
          • func.nn.backprop.BackPropagationBiasNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BackPropagationBiasNode
extends BackPropagationNode
    A bias node, implemented as a node that refuses to feed forward values or backpropagate values. This is a little wasteful since as it is used it has useless links that go into it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • feedforward

        public void feedforward()
        Description copied from class: FeedForwardNode
        Feed forward the activation values into this node. Calculates the sum of the input values and stores this value into weightedInputSum. Runs this sum through the activation function and stores this into the activation for the node.
        Overrides:
        feedforward in class FeedForwardNode
        See Also:
        nn.FeedForwardNode#feedforward()

      • backpropagate

        public void backpropagate()
        Description copied from class: BackPropagationNode
        Back propagate error values. For nodes that have output links, first calculates the derivative of the error function with respect to this node by finding the weighted sum of the errors of nodes this node outputs to, and multiplying that by the derivative of the activation function applied to the weighted input sum. For nodes with output links, simply moves the error to the output (assuming that the appropriate error function / activation function combination was used).
        Overrides:
        backpropagate in class BackPropagationNode
        See Also:
        nn.backprop.BackPropagationNode#backpropagate()
